name: EARTH DEFENSE FORCE 5 - Air Raider Weapon FZ-GUN
detailed_description:
A new model of flamethrower-equipped sentry gun. After its placement, it uses its camera and sensors to detect and automatically attack enemies. You can place it with the attack button, and activate it with the zoom/activate button after. After its activation, it will automatically attack enemies in its range.
The gun is equipped with powerful safety devices to ensure a lack of friendly fire."
